content: s double_crochet s chain 2 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet into the next st miss the next 2 sts sl-st into the next st miss the next 2 sts make a leaf as described earlier in the next st miss 2 sts sl-st into the next st* repeat from * to * 4 more time miss the next 2 sts make a leaf in the next st miss the next 2 sts sl-st into the last 2 sts turn now we will sl-st into every st of the leaves when you reach the centre chain 2 make a picot chain 3 sl-st into the 3rd chain from the hook sl-st back into the ch2 space continue sl- stitching and making your picots along the row fasten_off and sew in the ends your scarf is now finished i would recommend washing your scarf on a low setting and then gentling blocking it to open up the design my scarf roughly measures 70 inches 178 cm by 14 inches 36 cm i really hope you ve enjoyed making my scarf i d love to see any that you make so please feel free to tag me on instagram or facebook so i can follow your work i m always here to help with any problems just pop me a message enjoy suzy xoxo
